Title: The Truth About Charlie
Writer: Peter Stone (based on the motion picture "Charade" screenplay by), Jonathan Demme (screenplay), Steve Schmidt (screenplay), Peter Stone (screenplay), Jessica Bendinger (screenplay)
Actors: Olga Sékulic, Stephen Dillane, Françoise Bertin, Thandie Newton
Plot: A woman returns from holiday to find her husband has been murdered, and several groups of people are pressuring her to unravel the mystery of his true identity and activities during his final days.
